data.title: Raquel Torres Hernandez Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Raquel Torres Hernandez, age 74, currently of Bridgeport, has passed away from this world into the presence of God on April 14, 2023, in Bridgeport Hospital. Raquel was born in...
data.text:
Raquel Torres Hernandez, age 74, currently of Bridgeport, has passed away from this world into the presence of God on April 14, 2023, in Bridgeport Hospital. Raquel was born in Caguas, Puerto Rico. Raquel's personality was unique, she was a jokester who joyful bought smiles to whomever she shared encountered. She will be sadly missed by all and forgotten by none.

Raquel is the daughter of the late Tomas Torres Rodriguez and the late Ana Hernandez . Raquel is survived by her siblings Carlos, Edelmira, Milagros, Reina Ester, Damaris, Ana Torres Hernandez, Gin Torres Hernandez, Fortuna Torres Hernandez and Magaly, and a host of other relatives and friends who will dearly miss her. She was predeceased by her siblings Carmen Iris and Hector and her recently departed stepmother Guadalupe Lebron Cruz.

Friends are invited to attend calling hours to be held on Thursday, April 20, 2023, from 5-8 P.M. at the Funeral Home. Final disposition will take place at the convenience of the family.

Please sign her Family Authorized online Memorial Register book where you may share memories, prayers, pictures and more, but EXCLUSIVELY at www.luzdepaz.com.

Please be advised that it is our commitment, since our beginning, that all information on our website be as accurate as possible to the best of our knowledge. We also understand unique situations may influence effective communication, as well as a variety spellings and family dynamics may result in errors. I guarantee all corrections may be made, if necessary, BUT it is imperative that any such changes be provided or called into our office by the Legal Next of Kin, Appointed by NOK or Legally Appointed Representative who contracted our firm. That person is the who can call our office to make the requested.

-In appreciation of your understanding,

Edgar Rodriguez, Owner/Director
